alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 03 at 12:46PM PST until February 04 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 7 PM PST SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of the Shasta Valley from Grenada to Weed, including portions of Interstate 5. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 7 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
